option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <!-- Material Design 3 Chip Suggestion Style --> <style name="Widget.Material3.Chip.Suggestion" parent="Widget.MaterialComponents.Chip"> <item name="chipBackgroundColor">?attr/colorSurface</item> <item name="chipStrokeColor">?attr/colorOutline</item> <item name="chipStrokeWidth">1dp</item> <item name="android:textColor">?attr/colorOnSurface</item> <item name="closeIconTint">?attr/colorOnSurface</item> </style> </resources>
